intro: This document serves as a comprehensive guide for creating technical documentation tailored for the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS). It focuses on utilising Quarto, a versatile tool that streamlines the process of writing professional-quality documents in Markdown and converting them into HTML and PDF formats. The guide covers essential aspects such as Markdown syntax, project structure, template usage, document rendering, and the collaborative review and publication process, ensuring consistency and clarity in all CLMS technical documents.
